:root { --accent: #b32ebd; } body { font-family: sans-serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; } header { background: var(--accent); color: white; padding: 1rem; text-align: center; } .hero { text-align: center; padding: 2rem; } .hero img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; } #about, #skills, #projects, #contact { padding: 1rem; } .chips { display: flex; gap: 0.5rem; } .chips span { background: var(--accent); color: white; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 1rem; } article { margin: 1rem 0; } article img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; }
// Minimal JS for interactivity if needed
